availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Estill County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Nancy Witt. Father of William M. Witt, Henry G. Witt, and David Witt. Farmer in Estill County in 1850 and 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in 1850 and eleven in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 108. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 792. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 103. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, p. 6. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Estill County, Crooked Creek, p. 16.
